chart.title: Birth rate
chart.subtitle: The number of live births occurring during the year, per 1,000 people.

Birth rate - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.descriptionShort: Number of births recorded annually, divided by population in that year. It is based on the civil calendar year, spanning from January 1 to December 31.
Birth rate - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Birth rate - Sex: all - Age: all - Varia.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Birth rate,total – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].
